entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9 except 14 inland. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog retreating to the coast. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High 9 except 14 inland. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning late this evening and ending before morning. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 late this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016
